sentences.sContent: We don't expect candidates to be paragons of virtue.
sentences.sCn: 我们不指望候选人都是道德完人。

synos.tran: 模范；完美之物；优秀之人

remMethod.val: para(旁边) + gon(角， 样子) → 让旁人学习的样子 → 模范

trans.tranCn: 模范， 完美典型， 典范
trans.tranOther: someone who is perfect or is extremely brave, good etc – often used humorously
